Class: TurtleService

TurtleService(entity)

Represents a service that manages contexts and methods for an entity.

Constructor

new TurtleService(entity)

Creates an instance of TurtleService.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
entity Object

The entity that this service will manage.

Classes

TurtleService

Methods

call() → {Object}

Calls and returns all defined methods.

Returns:

An object containing all defined methods.

Type
Object

define(name, callback)

Defines a method with a name and a callback.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the method to define.
callback function

The callback function to be executed when the method is called.

getContext(name) → {TurtleContext|null}

Retrieves a context by name.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the context to retrieve.
Returns:

The context associated with the given name, or null if not found.

Type
TurtleContext | null

useContext(name, context)

Uses a context by name and sets it in the service.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
name string

The name of the context.
context TurtleContext

The context to set, must be an instance of TurtleContext.
Throws:

Throws an error if the context is not an instance of TurtleContext.

Type
Error
